## Overview

The `scores_by_task()` function renders a bar plot for comparing eval scores.

```{python}
from inspect_viz import Data
from inspect_viz.view.beta import scores_by_limit

evals = Data.from_file("cybench_token_usage.parquet")
scores_by_limit(
  evals,
  x="token_limit",
  y="success_rate",
  fx="difficulty",
  color_by="model"
  )
```
